Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: which
Description: Locate a program in the user's PATH

Arguments.Name: s
Arguments.Description: No output, return 0 if all the executables are found, 1 if not

Arguments.Name: a
Arguments.Description: List all instances of executables found, instead of just the first

Arguments.Name: names
Arguments.CustomCommand:
bash -c for i in $(echo $PATH | tr ":" "
"); do find $i -maxdepth 1 -perm -111 -type f; done
